General.Name: Joint Stock Commercial Bank for Investment and Development of Vietnam
General.Description: Joint Stock Commercial Bank for Investment and Development of Vietnam provides various banking products and services for individuals, corporate customers, and financial institutions in Vietnam. The company accepts various deposits products, such as current accounts, term deposits, current accounts for securities investment and specialized capital deposits, specialized deposits, escrow accounts, valuable papers, and other deposits. It also offers home, auto, overseas education, unsecured personal instalment, business, pledged, secured personal instalment, regular, investment, overdraft, and special loans, as well as discounted valuable papers; guarantees; and debit and credit cards. In addition, the company provides digital banking, payment and transfer, cash flow management, management of payables and receivables, life and non-life insurance, and cashier services; securities brokerage and trading services, and derivative securities; business cards; and foreign currency trading and bond issuance consulting services, as well as structured investment products. Further, it offers trade finance; investment banking services, such as mergers and acquisition advisory, financial restructuring, and equity capital market services; and legal advisory services for small and medium corporate customers. The company was formerly known as Bank for Investment and Construction of Vietnam and changed its name to Joint Stock Commercial Bank for Investment and Development of Vietnam in 1990. The company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Hanoi, Vietnam. Joint Stock Commercial Bank for Investment and Development of Vietnam operates as a subsidiary of The State Bank of Vietnam.
